long_description: This Dura-Ace/Ultegra bottom bracket tool is required for installing BB-7700, BB-6500 and BB-5500 22mm hollow spindle brackets. Also works for BB-7410, BB-UN91/90, BB-UN72/71/70, BB-UN52/51/50, BB-CS21/20/15/11/10, BB-LP30/27/26/25/20, BB-CT92/91/90 and BB-M952. Durable tool steel construction for long use.
short_description: This Dura-Ace/Ultegra bottom bracket tool is required for installing BB-7700, BB-6500 and BB-5500 22mm hollow spindle brackets.
